channel.title: open source on icasimpan
channel.description: Recent content in open source on icasimpan

item.title: IBM Buys RedHat
item.description: Yes, it’s official: IBM is indeed buying RedHat. I’m an pro-Open Source and RedHat (and derivative OS such as CentOS) is my favorite but I don’t see anything bad from it. Instead, I’m very happy that the enterprise world that IBM represents some several decades ago is now taking in RedHat (a huge Open Source advocate AND backer) as it’s own. Whether open source or closed source, any business would need to be in a good financial capacity in order to move forward.

item.title: Projects
item.description: shcf - Shell Coding Simplified! An open source Shell SDK that let’s you code big projects but without hindering how you code. See https://ismael.casimpan.com/shcf docktie - Docker Shortie An open source tool written in bash and shcf, simplifying calls to commands inside docker containers. See https://github.com/icasimpan/docktie
